hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Shadow Temple Wind Hint Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?
